extendedInfo.description: andBattleship variant of battleship.  You get as many shots as you have ships remaining.Its beta so please be patient with bugs :)Features:-Solo-Bluetooth head to head (Android 2.01 and higher)-Network head to head with option to pair up with a friend.*NEW* bug fixes, removed wakelocks

reviews.title: Disappointed!!!
reviews.comment: Getting more buggy with time! The splashing from shots just runs all the time now... etc... guess its never coming out if beta... :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Work
reviews.comment: Game works well on Galaxy Note. Graphics could be better and would really like an option for non-timed or unlimited time play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game! Always loved Battleship. Can you make available for Blackberry?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: An ok variant. Not too different. You just get more shots per round depending on how many ships you still have. Played much more interesting variants.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: We had a great time playing! Looking forward to seeing updates. G2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very fun. Like this version. Needs cooler looking ships.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 5 stars! amazing multiplayer battleship game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game. Exactly what I was looking for. Great for in office games via wifi or Bluetooth
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice twist having extra shots based on ships remaining. But network game never loads
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Game play is awesome. Never works when trying to play a reach. Always have to go back and start new network game. Evo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Like the game, suggestion make the grid lines darker, it will make it more visual for were you havn\'t fired yet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty COOL! BT and WiFi games with friends. Lost connections on some games. Maybe due to signal strength.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The computer gets 4 times as many turns as a player.... how the hell can you win with those odds. This sucks butt.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Won\'t connect to play with someone else. Sad face
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Positioning ships runs out the set up clock before they move any where, annoying. They should just be randomly placed by button. good graphics/sound.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I know what it takes, good app. Works great having a good time with friends.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Def needs a UI overhaul. A bit laggy on multiplayer. No one is ever online!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: OUTSTANDING!!! Game worked flawlessly, I\'m hooked
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good game. But a bit unfair if you are loosing. The number of torpedoes should be the other way around. To even the game out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Network game can\'t connect to network and the force closes..
reviews.author: A Google User
